name: Claude Plus V1

stages.name: Proof Validation
stages.description: Final quality assurance and proof verification

userContext: Design a working mockup of a spaceship's game interface for item crafting - items will require components to craft - do competitive analysis to understand what gamers expect from a AAA title. This should be developed in a way that it can be dropped in with real data sources and render within an existing menu container (so this is like one tab in that). We love glassy spaceship effects. Work hard and produce a high quality product

results.planning:
UNDERSTANDING: User wants a high-quality spaceship game interface mockup for item crafting that includes component requirements, follows AAA game standards, integrates into existing menu systems, and features glassy spaceship visual effects.

APPROACH: Research AAA game crafting interfaces, analyze current codebase architecture, design a modular component that can integrate with existing menu systems, and implement with realistic data structures and spaceship aesthetics.

STEPS: 
1) Use WebSearch to research AAA game crafting interfaces (EVE Online, Elite Dangerous, No Man's Sky, Star Citizen)
2) Use Glob and Read tools to examine existing codebase structure and identify menu container patterns
3) Use WebSearch for modern UI/UX patterns and glassy/spaceship visual design trends
4) Create component architecture that accepts data props for easy integration
5) Implement HTML/CSS/JS mockup with realistic crafting data structures
6) Design responsive layout that works within container constraints
7) Implement glassy spaceship visual effects using CSS (backdrop-filter, gradients, animations)
8) Create sample data representing items, components, and crafting requirements
9) Add interactive features (hover states, selection, crafting simulation)

TEST_CONSIDERATIONS: Will test interface with various screen sizes, different item/component quantities, edge cases like missing components, complex crafting trees, and integration within different container sizes. Will validate against AAA game standards and ensure visual effects perform well.

EVIDENCE: Will provide working mockup files, demonstrate responsive behavior, show integration capability with sample container, compare against researched AAA games, and document the component API for real data integration.

CONFIDENCE: High - Clear requirements for a well-defined UI component with established design patterns in gaming industry and technical implementation using standard web technologies.
results.review:
